dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 1688 IH: To amend the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 to designate 20 graduate medical education residency positions specifically for the study of optometry.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Denham introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 to designate 20 graduate medical education residency positions specifically for the study of optometry.

section.header: Graduate medical education residency positions in optometry
section.text: Section 301(b)(2)(A) of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 (Public Law 113–146; 38 U.S.C. 7302 note) is amended by striking positions. and inserting positions, including up to 20 positions specifically designated for residencies in optometry..
